snippet: Credit Suisse has donated a Trumbull portrait of Alexander Hamilton to both the Met in New York and the new Crystal Bridges Museum in Arkansas.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Credit Suisse donates a John Trumbull portrait of Alexander Hamilton to both the Met in New York and the new Crystal Bridges Museum in Arkansas; details about the international exhibition at this summer’s Venice Biennale are slowly being released by its curator, Massimiliano Gioni, who is also the Biennale’s artistic director.
lead_paragraph: Credit Suisse has donated a Trumbull portrait of Alexander Hamilton to both the Met in New York and the new Crystal Bridges Museum in Arkansas.

headline.seo: The Met and Crystal Bridges to Share a Trumbull Portrait
headline.main: The Met and Crystal Bridges to Share a Trumbull Portrait

keywords.value: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
